name: JB and Kochan: Adventures in Crashlandia
name_original: JB and Kochan: Adventures in Crashlandia
description:
W, A, S, D => to move

R => to restart

E => Scroll text and move blocks

brown blocks are pushable

pots go on squares

stairs go on stair outline

You may need love2d to play this game. we have a github: https://github.com/TheAceShinigami/GJ This is my first game with love2d although my partner has made other games. I would love feedback :)
